name: Donquixote Doflamingo
types: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
text: On Your Opponent's Attack Once Per Turn DON!!-1: Select your Leader or 1 of your (Donquixote Pirates) type Characters. Change the target of this attack to the selected card.
